sys_properties.description: Defines the text that should be displayed to the user before starting the baseline procedure. If empty, no message box is displayed. If set, the text will be displayed in a message box offering "OK" and "Cancel" options.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_devtools.baseline.sharedapp.message
sys_properties.value: Has the shared application been properly imported or updated? Are the application maintainer, maintainer email, documentation url and repository url up-to-date in the Shared Application record? Do all ATF tests in the applicaton's default test suite pass? Are there no CodeSanity findings?
